project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide expansion and improvement of education and training opportunities in rural areas by establishing 204 Rural Community Learning Centers which would offer formal and non-formal education and training for both children and adults; 4 Agricultural Training Centers to serve farmers and and other adults in rural areas; equipment and teaching aids to enable the extension of the reformed secondary education curriculum to 14 existing lower secondary schools; expanding 5 and constructing 2 vocational training centers, 8 mobile units and establishing a national vocational training scheme; technical assistance to implement the above programs and for improving education statistics, for feasibility studies and for preparing a possible third education project.
